apoli.description: A module that switches power data from Apace's Apoli.
apoli.enabled: Power data will be saved alongside each presets' origins.
apoli.disabled: Powers will be created fresh when switching presets with different origins.
apoli.warning: All power data (resources, extra inventory, etc.) for other presets' origins will be dropped/lost!

drogtor.description: A module that switches nicknames from unascribed's Drogtor The Nickinator.
drogtor.enabled: You will be able to set nicknames per-preset.
drogtor.disabled: You will share a single nickname across all presets.
drogtor.warning: All other nicknames will be cleared!

hidearmor.description: A module that switches hidden armor from unascribed's Fabrication's /hidearmor.
hidearmor.disabled: /hidearmor will change armor visibility for all presets.
hidearmor.warning: All other /hidearmor settings will be cleared!

fabrictailor.description: A module that switches player skins from samolego's Fabric Tailor.
fabrictailor.enabled: You will be able to set a skin per-preset.
fabrictailor.disabled: You will share a single skin across all presets.
fabrictailor.warning: All other overridden skins will be cleared!

origins.description: A module that switches layered Origins from Apace's Origins.
origins.enabled: You will be able to have an origin (or layered set) for each preset. BYO Orbs of Origin.
origins.disabled: You will share one set of origins across all presets.
origins.warning: All other sets of origins will be lost!

pehkui.description: A module that switches scale values (e.g. sizes) from Virtuoel's Pehkui.
pehkui.enabled: Scale changes will apply only to the current preset.
pehkui.disabled: Scale changes will apply regardless of the current preset.
pehkui.warning: All other scale values wil be cleared!

styled_nicknames.description: A module that switches nicknames from Patbox's Styled Nicknames.
styled_nicknames.enabled: You will be able to set nicknames per-preset.
styled_nicknames.disabled: You will share a single nickname across all presets.
styled_nicknames.warning: All other nicknames will be cleared!
